item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: December 4, 2022 Today's Verse John 3:3 [3] Jesus answered him, “Truly, truly, I say to you, unless one is born again he cannot see the kingdom of God.” Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
